content: this easy-level pattern is versatile and trendy the pattern includes written instructions and a video tutorial for added support using red heart s super saver brushed yarn in aran weight you ll create a soft and warm hat with just 140 yards of yarn make it a set with the matching scarf **unique features-** easy-level pattern suitable for all skill levels ribbon design adds visual interest top-down construction for seamless finish fits most teens and adults includes written instructions and video tutorials uses just 140 yards of yarn for a budget-friendly project versatile beanie perfect for gifting or personal use matching ribbon run scarf pattern makes it a set **materials needed-** hook 6 5mm us size 10 5 yarn **red heart super saver brushed** https //amzn to/47acnxh aran weight 140 yards
